reference.title: Ice Cream Machine Components
reference.shortdesc: This details the elements of the Shanks ice cream machine.

dlentry.dd: Use this to pour ingredients into the freezer bowl without interfering with the freezing cycle. The measurement cup is especially useful for add-ins like chocolate chips and sprinkles.
This lid is transparent so you can directly observe the freezing process, and the spout allows you to add different ingredients to the mixture with ease!
This unique mixing arm combines your ingredients in the mixing bowl, churning and turning until it yields the perfect bowl.
This double-insulated bowl is kept in the freezer whenever it isn’t in use.
This is where you let the machine know whether you want ice cream, gelato, or sorbet. The control panel also houses the start/stop button that you’ll press to get the freezer bowl turning.
This is the part of the machine that should be in the room at all times. It houses the motor needed to make hundreds of bowls of frozen treats.
